Articles.Content:
Hi guys. I just thought I'd share something I've been working on lately. Using Blender, I made a model of the canceled Orion nuclear pulse rocket. I wasn't sure where to put this, but I chose here because it's not exactly KSP-related, and it's not real life either. But anyway, here are a few pictures.

The starship itself.

With pedestal.

I would like to print it out sometime but I'm worried about it coming out badly. I'd probably have to print out individual components and glue them together like a model rocket. Either way, tell me what you think!
There is in fact a mod in KSP just about this.
Yes, I've looked at that. This is just supposed to be a fun little project. It's a shame this thing was never actually built, though.
